actions.description: The scout makes three Armblade or Bolt Launcher attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of Snare Trap.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Armblade

actions.description: 8 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bolt Launcher

actions.description: The scout deploys a Tiny mechanical trap on a solid surface within 5 feet of itself. The trap is hidden, requiring a successful DC 17 Intelligence (Investigation) check to find. The trap lasts for 1 minute. Whenever an enemy enters a space within 10 feet of the trap or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 21 (6d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition. A creature makes this saving throw only once per turn.
actions.name: Snare Trap (1/Day)

specialTraits.description: The scout has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the scout's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics
